https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/A6chLPTTsacBOd1pQq9s9GdHr81.jpg In a sunny district of Naples where everyone knows each other, Mario and Lino, two inseparable friends, live day by day in the monotony of neighborhood life until their fraternal friendship is put to the test. Blessed Boys
